sentences.sentence: When food stores close, they go to work, pilfering food for resale on the black market.
sentences.translation: 食品店关闭后，他们就开始工作，偷取食物到黑市上重新贩售。

sentences.sentence: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.translation: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

sentences.sentence: I decided to increase my business by running a resale shop.
sentences.translation: 我决定经营一家二手店来扩大业务。
